articles.title: Formula 1 entries confirmed for Audi and Porsche - PistonHeads
articles.description: It's been on the cards for years - now VW's boss has acknowledged the need to compete in F1 from 2026
articles.content: "You just run out of arguments" said VW CEO Herbert Diess. Those arguments were about whether or not the VW Group should enter F1. and now it is, after the board finally gave the green light. And not… [+5049 chars]
